basics.name: Geoffrey Karnbach
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary:
My name is Geoffrey, I am 20 years old and program since I am 11 years old.

I espeically enjoy working with Python (Flask, anything Data Science or ML related), Java (SpringBoot) and JavaScript (Angular).

I worked amongst other projects on this project during my role as 'Studentischer Mitarbeiter'.

projects.name: DBREPO - A Database Repository
projects.summary:
DBRepo is a repository for data in databases that are used from the beginning until the end of a research project supporting data evolution, -citation and -versioning.

I worked amongst other projects on this project during my role as 'Studentischer Mitarbeiter'.
